opinion.author: jkenneth52
opinion.post:
As Daveb already drew attention to…I also wondered why there was no reference to the possibilty that the sample cloth used to do the carbon dating ….may have been taken from the repaired portion of the shroud.
I’m looking forward to someday seeing another carbon testing…from an area that we are certain was not a repaired sample.
opinion.title: Nice Short Summary of the Shroud of Turin
